wikipedia_page.main: Robert Turnbull (17 December 1895 – 18 March 1952) was an English international footballer, who played as an outside right.

response: * Robert Turnbull (American politician) (1850–1920), U.S. Representative from Virginia
* Robert Turnbull (Australian politician) (c. 1819–1872), member of the Victorian Legislative Council
* Robert Turnbull (railway manager) (1852–1925), general manager and director of the LNWR
